attributes.action: To dual the A303 from the M5 through to Honiton where it joins the A30
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This road needs to be dualed so as to avoid all the tail backs and hold ups when all the holiday makers head for the west country not just in the summer time it would speed journy time and relieve all the frustration of being held up at the end of a length dual carriage way as traffic waits to join single carriage way
